bug.author: limesun
bug.description:
Hi spacy, I am trying to install/test sense2vec but got an installation issue like below. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
C:\Users\great>pip install sense2vec==1.0.0a0 Collecting sense2vec==1.0.0a0 Downloading <denchmark-link:https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/28/4a/a1d9a28545adc839789c1442e7314cb0c70b8657a885f9e5b287fade7814/sense2vec-1.0.0a0.tar.gz>https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/28/4a/a1d9a28545adc839789c1442e7314cb0c70b8657a885f9e5b287fade7814/sense2vec-1.0.0a0.tar.gz</denchmark-link> (311kB) 100% |################################| 317kB 1.8MB/s Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info: Traceback (most recent call last): File "", line 1, in File "C:\Users\great\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-2ics1q41\sense2vec\setup.py", line 169, in setup_package() File "C:\Users\great\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-2ics1q41\sense2vec\setup.py", line 107, in setup_package readme = f.read() File "c:\users\great\appdata\local\enthought\canopy\edm\envs\user\lib\encodings\cp1252.py", line 23, in decode return codecs.charmap_decode(input,self.errors,decoding_table)[0] UnicodeDecodeError: 'charmap' codec can't decode byte 0x9d in position 13089: character maps to <denchmark-code>---------------------------------------- </denchmark-code>
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in C:\Users\great\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-2ics1q41\sense2vec\ <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
C:\Users\great>python -m spacy info <denchmark-code>Info about spaCy
Python version 3.5.2 Platform Windows-10-10.0.16299-SP0 Models en, en_core_web_lg, en_core_web_md, en_vectors_web_lg Location C:\Users\great\AppData\Local\Enthought\Canopy\edm\envs\User\lib\site-packages\spacy spaCy version 2.0.12.dev0 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Thanks â€“ looks like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/sense2vec/blob/master/setup.py#L106>this call</denchmark-link> in the is missing an . Just fixed this over in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/sense2vec>sense2vec repo</denchmark-link> , so this should be fixed for the next release. In the meantime, you can also clone the repo and build it from source: python setup.py build_ext --inplace
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
